mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg (MId, ToSId, FromSId, MRead,MContent, MDate,MMark) VALUES(#{mId}, #{toSId}, #{fromSId}, #{mRead},#{mContent}, #{mDate}, #{mMark})
mapper.update: UPDATE msg SET ToSId = #{toSId}, FromSId = #{fromSId}, MRead = #{mRead}, MContent = #{mContent}, MDate = #{mDate}, MMark = #{mMark} WHERE MId = #{mId}
mapper.select: SELECT MId, ToSId, FromSId, MRead, MContent, MDate, MMark FROM msg WHERE MId = #{mId} AND MMark>0
SELECT MId, ToSId, FromSId, MRead,MContent, MDate,MMark FROM msg WHERE MMark>0
